FuncDef: This command associates router IP addresses with the parental IP interface IP addresses.

ParaDef.Info: The virtual router IP address expressed in dotted decimal notation. The IP virtual router IP address must be in the same subnet of the parental IP interface IP address or equal to one of the primary or secondary IP addresses for owner virtual router instances. Values-1.0.0.1 to 223.255.255.254.

ExtraInfo: Default: no backup - No virtual router IP address is assigned.
